title: Real Rare Crystals
description: Over 25 Real Rare Crystals with highly customizable Material Generator and Crystal Cluster Generator!
longDescription:
Real Rare Crystals is a pack of handcrafted beautiful crystals perfect to bring life to your game environment.

Create your own unique materials by creating an instance of the master materials and tweaking to your hearts content. Virtually limitless material combinations.

Don't settle for cartoony, poorly shaded, low res textured crystal packs, demand the best. This complete set will have you on your way to creating a magical crystal environment with zero setup time.

All crystals have their own mask maps baked out and included so you can adjust every detail of your crystal like ridge color, gradient fade point, wear and more.


Discord Support: https://discord.gg/6qVCQeU
technicalDetails:
Features:

  •  25 Crystal Meshes + 10 that have real inner flecks
  • Extensive Master material creator for both the crystal externals and internal flecks, incredibly customizable!
  •  Crystal cluster generator for quick cluster setup and deployment


Texture Sizes:

  •  Crystal masks 2048x2048
  •  Some shared gradients and grunge maps 512x512


Scaled to Epic skeleton: (Yes)

Collision: (Yes, automatically generated)

Triangle Count: 60 for smallest crystals to 104 for larger crystals to 1161 for large crystals with inner flecks.

Vertex Count: 148 for smallest crystals to 288 for larger crystals to 3363 for large crystals with inner flecks.

LODs: 0

Number of Meshes: 25 Crystals + 10 with inner flecks

Number of Materials and Material Instances: 2 Master Materials and 45 Material Instances

Number of Textures: 56 Total (6 Shared)

Supported Development Platforms: Windows, Mac, Linux

Supported Target Build Platforms: Steam VR / HTC Vive, Oculus, Gear VR, Linux, HTML5, Xbox One, Android, iOS, PS4, Windows, Mac

Documentation: No documentation required, just drop into your game and go!

Important/Additional Notes: Feel free to get in contact for support if required however everything has been made as easy as possible to get you up and running in no time.
